specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: There will be a brief business meeting after the morning service to consider improvements to our fellowship hall and basement:
1. Replacement of old tile with vinyl pieces that will have a wood grain finish
4. Repair leaks in the old furnace room
Estimated cost: $25-30,000.00. A vote will be held at the end of the meeting.
